title: New Five-Star St. Regis Dubai Opulence on The Palm with Daily Breakfast & Butler Service
description:
Indulge in a higher level of Middle Eastern opulence and storied heritage at the world-renowned St. Regis Dubai, The Palm. An ultra-indulgent and exquisite addition to Dubai, this new extravagant property is a sophisticated oasis of signature service, uncompromising refinement, and exquisite aesthetics, with a remarkable sense of modern glamour.

Occupying the first 18 floors of the Palm Tower, The St. Regis Dubai, The Palm offers 264 lavishly appointed guestrooms and 26 elegant suites - each a thoughtfully curated sanctuary with exceptional amenities, sweeping views of Palm Jumeirah and the Arabian Gulf, and personalised 24-hour St. Regis butler service. Consider this a destination within a destination, where you can experience the renowned hallmarks of the St. Regis brand. Take yourself on a culinary journey at the hotel's diverse selection of restaurants, bars and lounges, including the iconic St. Regis Bar, Dip Pool Bar, and the ladies-only Her by Caroline Astor for its legendary afternoon tea ritual. Unwind with a treatment or two at the luxurious Iridium Spa, work up a sweat at the state-of-the-art fitness centre, soak up some sun at the lavish outdoor pool or walk next door to the connecting Nakheel Mall, which offers world-class shopping, a 15-screen cinema, and a variety of culinary options and entertainment venues.
location_description: The St. Regis Dubai, The Palm
offer_address: The Palm Jumeirah - Dubai - United Arab Emirates

title: Luxe Five-Star Dubai Stay with Nightly Free-Flow Drinks
description:
Live the high life at the Grand Hyatt Dubai - a perfectly located five-star oasis towering majestically over Dubai Creek. This award-winning city retreat places you in the heart of a contrasting landscape where soaring skyscrapers and sweeping deserts meet an alchemy of tradition and glamour. Contemplate the city skyline from the soaring heights of the Burj Khalifa, watch the sun roll behind the dunes on a desert safari or bask in the Dubai sun by one the hotel's four swimming pools. From Bedouin banquets to Michelin stars, futuristic malls to bustling bazaars, experience it all from the luxury launchpad of your five-star hotel.

**Travelling as a couple?** Pick the Dubai Escape package for two with club access, offering daily breakfast and nightly canapés with free-flow alcoholic and soft drinks in a dedicated club venue.

**Travelling with kids?** Upgrade to a family package for up to two adults and four children (aged 11 years and under) with daily breakfast, nightly dinner with free-flow drinks, a private arrival airport transfer and Kids' Club access.

All packages also include 20% off spa treatments and 20% off food and drinks at select restaurants. Plus, maximise your time from arrival to departure with early 10am check-in and late 6pm checkout.
offer_address: Riyadh Street, Sheikh Rashid Road, Dubai, United Arab Emirates

You will also benefit from 25% off dining and spa treatments throughout your stay, plus one child aged 11 years and under stays free!

Boasting an exquisite 12 dining venues, bars and lounges, six glistening outdoor pools and the rejuvenating Sofitel SPA with L’Occitane, the Sofitel Dubai The Palm has it all.

Make the most of your stay with daily dining across a selection of onsite restaurants and AED200 spa credit per package. The resort offers a tranquil atmosphere for all ages, with a purpose-built kids’ club and an adults-only pool. An endless stretch of private golden sands provides a playground of exhilarating watersports, romantic walks or basking in the Arabian sun.

description:
Standing tall against the dazzling Dubai city skyline, Sofitel Dubai The Obelisk is ready to welcome you to a world of luxury. French sophistication meets ancient Egyptian pharaonic flair in the largest Sofitel in the Middle East, a five-star haven ideally located for easy access to Dubai's best experiences - including countless souqs, Dubai Creek and the city's best shopping districts. Indulge in a stay that allows you to dine at one of five enticing venues, unwind by a luxurious Egyptian ankh-shaped pool, or pamper yourself with a Provence-inspired retreat at the Sofitel Spa with L'Occitane.

Ready to explore? Further afield you'll find the restored heritage area Al Fahidi District in Bur Dubai, and the evocative blazing desert landscapes that ensconce the city. Whether it’s a family stay or a romantic escape to one of the most exciting hubs in the Middle East, the Sofitel Dubai The Obelisk is where you need to be.

Dubai’s attractions, including the Nakheel Mall, Dubai Mall, Dubai Marina, Jumeirah Beach and Mall of the Emirates are at your fingertips. In a city with awe-inspiring architecture and a world-renowned beachfront, the Palm Jumeirah stands out as one of Dubai’s most intriguing destinations; a uniquely shaped haven of shopping, beachfront dining and glamorous hotels. description:
Dubai luxury meets Egyptian grandeur at the world-renowned Raffles Dubai. title: Iconic Palm Jumeirah Luxury with Sea-View Room Upgrade, Daily Breakfast & Nightly Dinner across 80+ Dubai Restaurants
description:

Step onto the sprawling private beachfront on the west side of the palm, hop between exquisite restaurants for a taste of Italian, Japanese and international cuisine, plunge into the mirage-like pool or treat your senses to a well-deserved treatment at Saray Spa. As day turns to night, take to the trendy bars for a cocktail and a boogie before retreating to the world-class rooms that await.

Only steps away, the Palm West Beach promenade will delight with water sports, an unbelievably blue ocean and a seemingly endless stretch of silky white sands - a beach day is a must. If you’re looking to explore the city, whizz down Sheikh Zayed Road and make your way to the bustling downtown area and Burj Khalifa, where you can spend hours shopping in high-end boutiques or mingling with locals at the vibrant souks.

title: Beachfront Autograph Collection Dubai Stay with Decadent Daily Dining & Nightly Free-Flow Drinks
description:
Autograph Collection is globally recognised for providing only the finest luxury accommodation and world-class service in some of the most spectacular destinations on the planet - and Habtoor Grand Resort is no exception. Comprised of two majestic towers, flawlessly manicured gardens, arches, domes and intricate Arabian details, Habtoor Grand Resort is a beachfront oasis just 15 minutes from Dubai Marina. The resort features a long list of glamorous facilities, including ten restaurants, four bars, the serene Elixir Spa, multiple sparkling swimming pools (including an adults-only and children's pool), four tennis courts, squash and racquetball courts and a kids’ club.

A paradise of world-class shopping, dining and entertainment, stunning deserts and ultramodern architecture, Dubai is more than just a must-visit destination - it's a stirring alchemy of tradition and glamour. Experience the extraordinary engineering feats of Burj Khalifa and Burj Al Arab, uncover the cultural side of this fascinating city with a visit to the Etihad Museum, displaying the heritage of the United Arab Emirates, take to the Dubai Opera House for a night of performing arts, or join a private safari in the desert.

title: Five-Star Dubai Palace Escape with Gourmet Daily Dining & Butler Service
description:
Enter a world of five-star opulence and grandeur with a lavish stay at the Habtoor Palace, LXR Hotels & Resorts, a palatial jewel on the banks of Dubai Water Canal in Al Habtoor City. Part of Hilton’s acclaimed LXR Hotels & Resorts brand - which includes prestigious designer properties in London, Las Vegas, Kyoto and Mahé (Seychelles) - this luxurious hotel features included personalised Butler Service, an adults-only rooftop pool, a 200-metre stretch of private pristine beach and seven eateries, including the award-winning World Cut Steakhouse. Dubai’s finest attractions, including the Nakheel Mall, Dubai Mall, Burj Khalifa, Dubai Marina, Jumeirah Beach and Mall of the Emirates, are also within a 25-minute drive.

In a city with awe-inspiring architecture and ambitious futuristic visions, Al Habtoor City stands as one of Dubai’s newest and most elegant luxury precincts; a landmark nine-hectare hospitality, residential and leisure complex with gourmet dining and glamorous hotels. From Habtoor Palace, LXR Hotels & Resorts, you’ll be perfectly placed to discover the dawn of a new city in the Persian Gulf.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Daily international buffet breakfast at BQ French Kitchen & Bar
- Nightly à la carte dinner at your choice of BQ French Kitchen & Bar, Le Patio or World Cut Steakhouse
- Celebrate your escape with a welcome drink each on arrival
- Rediscover tranquillity with a 25% discount on treatments at the Silk Spa
- Enjoy early check-in and late checkout, subject to availability
- One child (2-11) stays free with full package inclusions
- Waldorf Astoria Dubai Palm Beach access

**Suite upgrade available:** Elevate your stay with an upgrade to a lavish Diplomat Suite. The ultimate experience, these stunning suites feature a separate living area and a spacious bathroom with soaking tub and double vanities.

**Book with 100% Confidence:** If for whatever reason you don’t want to go on your holiday, you can cancel right up to 14 days before check-in and get a 100% credit to use at Luxury Escapes for any other accommodation offer. Excludes flights, see the Fine Print for details.

This ultra-eclectic five-star retreat is the epitome of indulgence and extravagance, with a five-story atrium showcasing eye-opening artwork and industrial-chic architecture influenced by Middle Eastern landscapes.

Elevate epicurean encounters at the resort's celebrity chef destination restaurants, Torno Subito - from Chef Massimo Buttura, the creative mastermind behind the three Michelin-starred Osteria Francescana - and Akira Back - sat atop W Dubai and bringing the tastes of Japanese cuisine prepared with a Korean essence to the Middle East for the first time. Rejuvenate with a luxurious targeted treatment followed by a cucumber mojito at the zen AWAY® Spa, or dip into a medley of topaz pools at the exclusive WET Deck -  a sun-drenched wonderland dotted with white wicker cabanas, semi-submerged lounges and a world-class sound system and DJ booth. Why not take the whole family away on this glitzy escape; little ones can enjoy a fun-filled holiday with kids' swimming pool and an indoor and outdoor Games Room featuring arts and crafts, mini bowling, board games and movie sessions.

All rooms and suites retain much of their original mid-century decor, including wood panelling and plush furnishings, as well as brass portholes, art deco accents and vintage nautical artwork.

Delight in an enticing afternoon tea at the Queens Grill, or catch all the action at the Golden Lion, Dubai's oldest pub. As you explore the ship, you'll uncover the original theatre that continues to offer world-class performances, a fully-equipped fitness centre, a nine-metre indoor pool and a museum revealing the vessel's captivating legacy.
